ComicInfo.Summary:
Hulk finds himself in the crossfire of the Israelis and the Arabs! Will Banner's compassion for a fallen child soften Sabra's heart?
Note: Features the Hostess Fruit Pies ad, Daredevil VS. Johnny Punk!
